statements: SELECT * FROM data_backups;
SELECT backup_id, backup_name, backup_type FROM data_backups WHERE backup_status = 'completed';
SELECT backup_id, backup_name, backup_time FROM data_backups ORDER BY backup_time DESC;
SELECT backup_name, backup_location FROM data_backups WHERE backup_type = 'manual' LIMIT 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_backups FROM data_backups WHERE backup_status = 'in_progress';
SELECT backup_id, backup_name, backup_location FROM data_backups WHERE backup_type = 'Full' ORDER BY backup_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT backup_id, backup_type, backup_status FROM data_backups WHERE backup_status = 'Success' ORDER BY backup_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_backups WHERE backup_location LIKE '%/prod%' AND backup_status = 'Failed';
SELECT backup_id, backup_name, backup_location FROM data_backups WHERE backup_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY backup_id;
SELECT COUNT(backup_id) AS total_backups, backup_type FROM data_backups GROUP BY backup_type HAVING COUNT(backup_id) > 5 ORDER BY total_backups DESC;
SELECT * FROM backups;
SELECT backup_name, backup_schedule FROM backups WHERE backup_id = 1;
SELECT backup_id, backup_name, backup_schedule FROM backups WHERE backup_schedule > '2022-01-01';
SELECT backup_id, backup_name FROM backups ORDER BY backup_id DESC;
SELECT backup_id, backup_name, log_timestamp, log_message FROM backups b JOIN backup_logs bl ON b.backup_id = bl.backup_id;
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_id = 1
SELECT backup_name, backup_schedule FROM backups ORDER BY backup_name DESC
SELECT backups.backup_id, backup_name, log_timestamp, log_message FROM backups JOIN backup_logs ON backups.backup_id = backup_logs.backup_id WHERE backups.backup_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT MAX(log_timestamp), MIN(log_timestamp) FROM backup_logs
SELECT backup_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM backup_logs GROUP BY backup_id HAVING log_count > 5
SELECT * FROM backups;
SELECT backup_name, backup_path FROM backups WHERE id = 1;
SELECT backup_name, backup_time FROM backups WHERE backup_path LIKE '%/home/%' ORDER BY backup_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM backup_schedule WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_time FROM backup_logs WHERE backup_id = 3 ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_time >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT backup_name, backup_path FROM backups WHERE id = 1
SELECT backup_name FROM backups ORDER BY backup_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT backup_name, backup_path FROM backups WHERE backup_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT backup_name, backup_path, backup_time FROM backups INNER JOIN backup_schedule ON backups.id = backup_schedule.backup_id
SELECT * FROM backups;
SELECT backup_name, backup_schedule FROM backups ORDER BY backup_schedule DESC;
SELECT backup_id, backup_name, backup_location FROM backups WHERE backup_schedule < NOW();
SELECT * FROM backup_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT backup_id, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM backup_logs GROUP BY backup_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT * FROM backups;
SELECT backup_name, backup_location FROM backups WHERE backup_schedule >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM backup_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT backups.backup_id, backup_name, job_status, job_details FROM backups JOIN backup_jobs ON backups.backup_id = backup_jobs.backup_id WHERE job_status = 'Completed';
SELECT backup_id, MAX(history_timestamp) AS latest_history_timestamp FROM backup_history GROUP BY backup_id ORDER BY latest_history_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM backup_config;
SELECT backup_name, backup_frequency FROM backup_config ORDER BY backup_name DESC;
SELECT backup_name, backup_location FROM backup_config WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM backup_job WHERE status = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY end_time DESC;
SELECT start_time, end_time FROM backup_job WHERE backup_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM backup_config;
SELECT backup_name, backup_location FROM backup_config WHERE backup_frequency > INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT b.backup_id, b.start_time, bh.backup_time, bh.backup_size FROM backup_job b JOIN backup_history bh ON b.backup_id = bh.backup_id;
SELECT bu.username, bu.password, bl.log_message FROM backup_users bu LEFT JOIN backup_logs bl ON bu.user_id = bl.backup_id;
SELECT * FROM backup_logs WHERE log_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
